name: BlocksVr
description:
Vr Port of Tetris clone made in Lua

Source code of the Original 2d game: https://simplegametutorials.github.io/love/blocks/

Source code of the Vr port: https://github.com/glitchapp/BlocksVr

Move with arrows or Vr Joystick.

z: Rotate counterclockwise

x: Rotate clockwise

c: Drop
